2.message: Its been a long time, lets catch up someday.

3.message: Just landed! See you in the hotel.

4.message: Such a busy day! feeling exhausted!

6.message: I'm happy you got the job, Best of luck!

7.message: The restraunt we went last time had very nice ambient.
